title: Elon Musk says he has picked a new CEO for Twitter
description: Musk had announced he would appoint a CEO late last year.

title: Cybersecurity faces a challenge from artificial intelligence’s rise
description: The prospect comes as a range of professionals report real progress in security, from slowing ransomware attacks to more timely sharing of information by the U.S. government.

title: Is the sun white or yellow? It’s a hot debate, and everyone’s wrong.
description: A Twitter post left people divided over the sun's color. We asked scientists to weigh in.
